name: app-builder
description: Simple, Composable, promise based middleware pipelines

scripts.coverage: rimraf coverage && babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --report text --report html node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha
scripts.codecov: npm run coverage && cat ./coverage/coverage.json | node node_modules/codecov.io/bin/codecov.io.js

author: Caleb Boyd (https://github.com/calebboyd)
